Before Pilate
     Men were imbued with a satanic spirit at the time when they decided that they would have Barabbas, a thief and murderer, in preference to the Son of God. The demoniac power triumphed over humanity; legions of evil angels took entire control of men, and in answer to Pilate's question as to whom he should release unto them, they shrieked out, \93Away with this man, and release unto us Barabbas.\94 When Pilate spoke again to them concerning Jesus, the hoarse cry was raised, \93Crucify him, crucify him.\94 Through yielding to demoniac agencies, men were led to take their stand on the side of the great apostate.
